data.name: Squeaky
data.fun_fact: Rubber ducks were invented in the late 19th century and were originally made from hard rubber.

data.name: Quackles
data.fun_fact: The world's largest rubber duck measured over 50 feet tall!

data.name: Ducky
data.fun_fact: Rubber ducks are often used as symbols for bath time fun, but they're also popular collectibles.

data.name: Rubberton
data.fun_fact: The traditional yellow rubber duck design was patented in the 1940s.
